name: Astro Flight
description:
Up, Right, and Left arrow KEYS to MOVE.

This an endless game with multiple obstacles that are randomly spawned with each having about a 20% chance of pawning. As the game progresses it becomes faster and more difficult, some obstacle may have more than one way of going thought then.This is a game made on Unity  and inspired by Flappy Bird.  

Comment if the game is too easy/hard or if the game needs fixing . Also comment if I should keep adding to this game. All suggestions will be  considered.

This is the first game that I have ever made so please consider donating to be able to create better and more games.
